ALLOCATED.doc: ALLOCATED(ARRAY) returns .TRUE. if the allocatable array is currently allocated. [F90]

LBOUND.doc: LBOUND(ARRAY,DIM,KIND) returns lower bound(s) of an array or a specified dimension. [F90]

UBOUND.doc: UBOUND(ARRAY,DIM,KIND) returns upper bound(s) of an array or a specified dimension. [F90]

SHAPE.doc: SHAPE(SOURCE,KIND) returns the shape of an array as a rank-one integer array. [F90]

SIZE.doc: SIZE(ARRAY,DIM,KIND) returns total elements or extent along a specified dimension. [F90]
